## Lab 6: Power and Effect Size

In this lab, you will use a published dataset from @tekin2021 to
calculate effect sizes using `MOTE` and conduct power analyses using
`WebPower` and `Superpower`.

This lab will be due on November 05, 2023. To access Lab 6, please go
here: [Click here](https://classroom.github.com/a/qxP4LfB1)
